channel.title: RineScape project
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i831.photobucket.com/albums/zz238/hontiris1/rinescaperandsandlogo.png[/img]
[B]notice:[/b] server is up for beta testing
download beta testing: [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/?eeyiynydzem"]http://www.mediafire.com/?eeyiynydzem[/URL]
[B]about RineScape[/B]
[ul][*] [B]coder's and creator's[/B][/ul]
[CENTER]hontiris1 gotham unholy man [/CENTER]
[ul][*] [B][information[/B][/ul]
[CENTER]RineScape is based of project insanity, but will be edited and converted. one of the reasons i pick project insanity is because the magic system is the one i prefer for my server. this will be a pk server with a creative economy by me, the items that will be dropped by npc will be edited and all npc's will be places in new spots that won't make the game to messed up. the combat will be updated and made a way that will make pking better.
The combat will compare to the Runescape combat during 2005, with correct timer for weapons, animations for emotes and whips, bonuses, calculations, and specials, this is one of the things that will be worked on the most.
the slayer system will be updated, everything that RineScape will have is going to be based of for pking and economy. there will be NO custom items, and no over power weapons. the models will be based of RuneScape 2005, there won't be any d claws at all to. construction will be added of medusa source converted into insanity source.
[B]update log[/B] [QUOTE]Latest Update, No 474 Gameframe, for now on it will be real PK with 459 gameframe.[/QUOTE]
[B]media[/B]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2da0gv7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1z4ftec.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/vzgai8.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
Support RineScape download the signature.
[URL=http://"http://www.upload.ee/files/637484/rinescape_***********_and_logo.png.html"]upload the signature.[/URL]

item.title: RineScape project
item.dc:creator: @hontiris1 hontiris1
item.description:
@hontiris1 wrote:

notice: server is up for beta testing

download beta testing: http://www.mediafire.com/?eeyiynydzem

about RineScape

[ul][*] coder’s and creator’s[/ul]

[CENTER]hontiris1
gotham
unholy man
[/CENTER]

[ul][*] [information[/ul]

[CENTER]RineScape is based of project insanity, but will be edited and converted. one of the reasons i pick project insanity is because the magic system is the one i prefer for my server. this will be a pk server with a creative economy by me, the items that will be dropped by npc will be edited and all npc’s will be places in new spots that won’t make the game to messed up. the combat will be updated and made a way that will make pking better.

The combat will compare to the Runescape combat during 2005, with correct timer for weapons, animations for emotes and whips, bonuses, calculations, and specials, this is one of the things that will be worked on the most.

the slayer system will be updated, everything that RineScape will have is going to be based of for pking and economy. there will be NO custom items, and no over power weapons. the models will be based of RuneScape 2005, there won’t be any d claws at all to. construction will be added of medusa source converted into insanity source.

update log

Latest Update, No 474 Gameframe, for now on it will be real PK with 459 gameframe.
